Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, everyone, to this year's <RED>Pet
Promenade</RED>. Are you ready to see this year's
finest animal friends?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Without further ado, allow me to introduce our
contestants.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #1, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME0>,
with <MOJI0> the
<MOJI2>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #2, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME1>,
with <MOJI0> the
<MOJI2>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #3, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME2>,
with <MOJI0> the
<MOJI2>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #4, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME3>,
with <MOJI0> the
<MOJI2>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, I have the honor of introducing our guest
judge...
<PAGE>
The renowned animal trainer, Woofio!

<FACE_WANTATAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hullo there, everyone! I'm Woofio, and I'm
doggone happy to be here!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We will now begin the judging segment of the
competition. Contestants, if you would please
return to the waiting area? Thank you.

<FACE_WANTATAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mmmm...I see, I see. This one has some
fetching qualities.

<FACE_WANTATAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hrmm...a bit of a ruff attitude, but not too bad.

<FACE_WANTATAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oho! This one's good, no bones about it!

<FACE_WANTATAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This one looks pawfully clever.

<FACE_WANTATAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hrmmm...this one isn't a total woofer, I guess.

<FACE_WANTATAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello? You awake? Hunh. Somebody seems
dog-tired.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, it seems the judging has
concluded. I will now announce the winners.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In first place, and the winner of this year's <RED>Pet
Promenade</RED> is...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME4>, with
<MOJI0>! Congratulations!!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In 2nd place is <MOJI1> Farm's
<CHARANAME1>!
<PAGE>
In 3rd place is <MOJI2>
Farm's <CHARANAME2>!
<PAGE>
And finally, in 4th place is
<MOJI3> Farm's
<CHARANAME3>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Again, congratulations to our winner,
<CHARANAME4>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We will now begin the awards ceremony.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will our winner, <CHARANAME4>, please step
forward?

<FACE_WANTATAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congrats to you on bein' the top dog! We've got
a mighty fine prize for ya -- this
<L_BLUE><ITEMNAME0></L_BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Keep up the good work now, okay?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
That concludes this year's <RED>Pet Promenade</RED>.
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for coming,
and we hope to see you again next year.
